projects.name: infinit
projects.title: Software-defined decentralized storage platform.
projects.description: Infinit is a next generation scalable and resilient storage platform that has been designed for modern environments like containers.

projects.name: elle
projects.title: The coroutine-based C++ development framework.
projects.description: Elle is a collection of libraries, written in modern C++ (C++14). It contains a rich set of highly reusable concepts, algorithms, API wrappers and more.

projects.name: dopenssl
projects.title: A deterministic implementation of some OpenSSL functionalities.

projects.name: [unnamed]
projects.title: Decentralized policy-based key-value store.
projects.description: Policy-based key-value store that has the particularity of being decentralized, doing away with the master/slave model that can incur bottlenecks and single points of failure.
